author: HJ
description: Attackers compress files for data exfiltration
name: Scen1-Tahoe-Data_Collection_via_zip

author: HJ
description: Attackers can infiltrate by disguising themselves as legitimate apps.
name: Scen1-Tahoe-app_execute
query: (aul.processImagePath:"runningboardd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.runningboard" AND aul.eventMessage:"Launch\ request" AND aul.eventMessage:"application.com.example.niceview")

author: HJ
description: Attackers drop malicious files to use
name: Scen1-Tahoe-Splunkd_drop
query: (aul.processImagePath:"kernel" AND aul.subsystem:"" AND aul.eventMessage:"responsibility\ for" AND aul.eventMessage:("splunkd" OR "apache" OR "Adobe\ Flash\ Player\ Install\ Manager" OR "lauchd" OR "kernl"))

author: HJ
description: Executing malicious files desired by the attacker
false_positives: Testing Legitimate app or mach-o file
name: Scen1-Tahoe-Splunkd_Execute
query: ((aul.processImagePath:("splunkd" OR "apache" OR "Adobe\ Flash\ Player\ Install\ Manager" OR "lauchd" OR "kernl") AND aul.subsystem:"" AND aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve\ User\ by\ ID") AND (NOT (aul.processImagePath.keyword:(\/System\/Library\/* OR \/usr\/libexec* OR \/usr\/sbin\/* OR \/System\/Applications\/* OR \/Applications\/* OR \/kernel*))))

author: HJ
name: Scen1-Tahoe-Splunkd_Reverseshell
query: ((aul.processImagePath:"kernel" AND aul.subsystem:"" AND aul.eventMessage:"tcp\ connected\:\ ") AND (NOT (aul.eventMessage:("\:80\]" OR "\:443\]" OR "\:5601\]" OR "\:5045\]"))))
